Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the disposal of copies of identification documents
Summary: Provides that the owner, lessor, proprietor or manager of any hotel, motel, steamboat, tourist cabins, camp, resort, tavern, inn, boarding or lodging house shall attempt to contact a guest if copies of identification documents are left after the guest has departed their stay; permits destruction of such documents if contact cannot be made.
LawCode: Add ยง209-h, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the disposal of copies of identification documents
